name: CitronRapide
storyline: On each turn, answer a question in a creative, funny or relevant way. Then comes the phase of revealing the answers. Each player evaluates and compares answers by awarding lemons. The player who gets most of the lemons at the end of the game wins the crown!
summary: CitronRapide is a French multiplayer browser-based quick game. Answer questions, rate your opponents and gain lemons!
